show_chart.description: show the COVid19 charts on 'chart' focus

config.title: chartlist
config.layout_chart_type: Select by Countries, US States, or US State Counties
config.country_description: comma separated list of country names
config.state_description: comma separated list of state names
config.county_description: comma separated, bracket grouped list [ county name, state name], [ county name, state name] ..
config.color_description: comma separated list of color names or values, eg:  red, blue, #07f
